title: The Last Recaps of 2019! RHOA/RHOC (Finale & Reunion)/RHONJ/RHOD (finale)
itunes:title: The Last Recaps of 2019! RHOA/RHOC (Finale & Reunion)/RHONJ/RHOD (finale)
itunes:subtitle: It's the last Bravo recaps of 2019! Danny dives into Real Housewives of Atlanta, which features a joyful Marlo/Porsha excursion. On Orange County, the women have their finale and then all hell breaks loose as Vicki braves her first reunion as a fr...
description:
It's the last Bravo recaps of 2019! Danny dives into Real Housewives of Atlanta, which features a joyful Marlo/Porsha excursion. On Orange County, the women have their finale and then all hell breaks loose as Vicki braves her first reunion as a friend of. On Jersey, Danny sobbed through Easter with the Gorgas. Finally, Dallas celebrates their finale with some tough-to-watch storylines.


RHOA: 6:16ish

RHOC: 19:50ish

RHONJ: 36:27ish

RHOD: 49:48ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
